This is  quality product. I combined it with a hydro-rail to create a rain shower with regular shower as well. The inital water amount is lacking but this is solved by removing the flow restrictor. On this head it is a little difficult to remove. I screwed a deck screw into the center of the plastic restrictor. I then used some pliers and applied some force to pull it out. It's in there pretty tight. After I removed it the flow is perfect. I also love the brushed bronze color from Kohler. If you ever need to match this color for other bath accessories the rustoleum metallic paint satin bronze is a great match. We spray painted a bench and some counter accessories and they look great.

product_title: T S Brass 5SP 14 Nozzle Swing 14 Length 3 4 27UN Laminar Outlet Device Chrome
product_description: Handle Lever Opening 3 1 2in Sink Hole T S Brass has set the quality standard in the industry for almost 50 years Laminar flow outlet device Country of Origin CHINA

reviews.review_body: We had to order this from Amazon for the nut swivel piece as the one sent with the factory unit was incorrect.  This fit perfectly and we were able to install in a second. Great quality and the extra length on the faucet is great ,too.

This nozzle has T&S on the packaging, but it is not up to the quality I have come to know for this company. I am concerned that it is a knock-off that has false information on the packaging. Buy one so you can see for yourself what I mean, and then return it like I am because it will not meet your expectations. BTW, it is not the standard size.
Great value for the cost. It’s longer than we needed, but we chose to get it longer because of how reasonably priced it was.

product_title: hansgrohe Metris Modern Upgrade Easy Install 1 Handle 1 6 inch Tall Bathroom Sink Faucet in Chrome 31088001
product_description: SUPERIOR DESIGN German design and engineering delivers optimal performance for all of your bath faucet needs FLEXIBLE CONFIGURATION This is a single hole faucet that can also be installed over existing 3 hole counter configurations baseplate sold separately STURDY MATERIALS Solid brass construction ensures a long product life LEAK FREE The ceramic cartridge ensures long term leak free operation and extends product life SIMPLE TO CLEAN The easy to clean anti limescale silicone aerator optimize water flow performance and can be quickly wiped clean WATER FLOW Low Flow compliant rate of 1 2 GPM SPRAY TYPE This faucet features an aerated spray which causes less splashing than traditional faucets

reviews.review_body: Hansgrohe. Solid build, easy install. Nice looks. Well engineered.
Love, love, love this faucet. Exactly what I was looking. Exceptional quality, sleek look. Perfect
The faucets look great and feel very substantial.  Great addition to our new bathroom.
Perfect works very well, months after installation

Great faucet.  However we didn't realize the size was bigger than we hoped (our fault).  Fortunately Hansgrohe had a similar style in the size we really wanted and the return/exchange went trouble-free.
Beautiful and sleek looking faucet. Stainless steel finish looks great. Water flow and pressure just right. Perfect for any bathroom

Despite the description stating it comes with a base plate, it doesn't come with one.  You should purchase it separately.  Very high quality faucet, but the extra expense of the plate ($40) is more than what we wanted to spend.
Sturdy faucet.....but when closed, a small pool of water stays on top of both flat surfaces. Don't know how this was overlooked during design and marketing process.
Happy with this purchase. It's a smooth operating faucet. You will probably need the faucet extension water lines, 3/8 male to 3/8 female.

I would give 0 star if there is an option! I hired a plumber to install it after receiving the brand new package. After removing my old faucet, the plumber found that the package is missing an important part, the rubber seal! It was listed on the instruction but the plumber and myself looked every corner of the package and could not find it. Obviously, it is either a restored product with missing part or a defective product. It will be too costy to put my old faucet back. Now I ended up with $150 plumbing bill for nothing and an unusable powder room! I am contacting the customer service and will update how it goes. But buyers be aware!
returned
It operates very smoothly. One has barely to touch it.

I just install this Matris faucet today.  The faucet is high quality and it looks good.  However, it is not water spot resistant and the weird thing is, when you wipe off the water...it leaves a greenish mark (see photo #1).  Also, there is always a drop of water hanging around on the tip of the spout when it is shut off (see photo #2).
Functional and attractive design. Industrial art.

I had high expectations of this faucet, and it's exceeded them.  It's heavy and solid.  The drain and closing mechanism are the best quality materials I've encountered in decades-they're not plastic.  The handle moves easily and smoothly.  My only small complaint in installation was that the hot and cold lines weren't labeled, fortunately I got them right the first time and it wouldn't have been much trouble to switch them.

I absolutely love these fixtures. The modern, sleek look is beautiful.  I love the way the handle has a slight upward curve. They are also not too large.  They do get water spots on the top so I've gotten into the habit of wiping them off with my towel.  The angle of the spout is good because the water stream is far enough from the edge of the sink to make it comfortable so you're not right at the edge of the sink.

Mechanically you could not ask for a better faucet, but water does collect on it. Cleans easily, but if someone uses it, there will be water spots to clean. Also does not look as good when the handle is not centered, No one ever takes the time to center it. Guess it does not bother them.

I needed faucets for two vanities I was installing in our new condo, and wanted something of highest quality and contemporary design. These fit the bill. They were easy to install and they work great.
This is a great faucet.  Design is perfect for 19 inch deep vanities.  It extends just enough and is not too tall. I also found it easy to install. .

product_title: ALFI brand AB5018 PSS Retractable Pot Filler Faucet Polished Stainless Steel
product_description: Uniquely double jointed design gives this faucet an extra long reach Up to 20 with ability to fold up against a wall Achieves both the ISO 9001 2000 and ISO 14001 2004 Certification Carefully constructed following the PPAP protocol of design Flow rate of 1 8 GPM allows the AB5018 to fill any pot or jug up quickly Quality Guaranteed Comes with a 5 year limited lifetime warranty

reviews.review_body: Looks great and works just as good.

product is missing the supply line doesnt look like a faucet sized supply is needed,much bigger. Looks like I have to go but this on my own and hope it works. no instructions packaged well. looks nice and heavy will update when installed
Absolutely love it!!! Great design, stylish but simplistic and easy to use.
I have not install yet but I love the quality and look.

product_title: Kohler Awaken K 98771 2BZ HANDSHOWER Cradle Oil Rubbed Bronze
product_description: Easily Mounts On The End Of Your Shower Arm Brass Ball Joint Pivots To Angle Hand Shower Fits Most Standard Hand Shower Hoses And Hand Showers From The Brand Name Kohler

reviews.review_body: The end that attaches to the shower arm (Kohler's arm) keeps leaking. We tried applying plumber's tape multiple times too.
Two cradles leaked. Sent bac?
I bought the Kohler awaken shower head to go with this and it doesn't fit snugly so every time I turn on the water the shower head jerks around and sprays outside the shower.
Fixed our issue

I bought two of these in oil rubbed bronze for two showers to thread onto separate nipples coming out of the wall to supply a hand shower in each bathroom.  The fitting also serves as a cradle for the handshower unit itself, which in both of my showers is a fairly heavy brass & plastic handshower.  I already installed one of these several years ago in one of my showers, but it was plastic, and I wanted to replace it with brass as is stated in the description of this fitting.  The second unit I bought was for a new shower installation.  Sadly, these fittings are plastic also, so I am returning one of them.  I am forced to use one of them in the new installation.  Ironically, I bought an identical fitting for my daughter's shower remodel a year ago, except it was in chrome.  Her chrome fitting is in fact, solid brass.  A small part of this fitting (the threaded part that screws onto the 1/2" pipe), is in fact brass, but the rest of the fitting is plastic.  Hopefully it won't break.  I am disappointed.  I don't understand why it is solid brass if chrome plated, but not if oil rubbed bronze.  I don't know about the other finishes.

It looks and does what it is supposed to. The only thing I would change would be to add some kind of rubber grip on the inside part that holds your shower head to keep it in position. You have to constantly mess with the hose/ head to get it facing straight. I have a little ocd just a little annoying. But other than that it looks and works fine.

product_title: American Standard 4503120 075 Liquid Soap Dispenser Stainless Steel
product_description: Complement your kitchen faucet with this Liquid Soap Dispenser from American Standard Designed for convenience it fills from the top and features a durable push action pump to stand up to the rigors of the busiest kitchen Accommodates countertops up to 2 3 8 in thick TOP FILL DESIGN is easy and convenient BRASS CONSTRUCTION for dependable performance MINIMALIST PROFILE coordinates with multiple faucet styles Easy to refill by simply removing pump and replenishing from the top

reviews.review_body: The soap dispenser has a very nice finish and the overall build is solid EXCEPT for the soap pump assembly. The pump assembly sits into the neck of the dispenser and free spins. It is so loose that the top housing moves back and forth like a little bell. The Kohler soap dispenser that finally went bad was a tight fit. In contrast, if you slightly bump the spout of the American Standard it will swing around to the back. The American Standard retails for $121 and bought it on Amazon for $78 (tax included). When I called support from the reseller he stated this was a builder's grade model and not to expect much. I do not consider this a builder's grade product as it is brass and stainless and the only plastic is the bottle and pump. I called the American Standard support line and was informed that this is the way it was designed. I guess it is time to get a new design team. I bought American Standard because they replaced the kitchen sink faucet under their lifetime warranty program. The soap dispenser has a one year warranty so I suspect I will be changing it out for a different manufacturer in a year. I would send it back but at 65 I am tired of wiggling my way under the sink to change it out, my back can only take  so much twisting now a days.
This was easy to install and looks great with my faucet. Works beautifully.

product_title: Peerless PTT14023 BN Westchester Valve Only Trim Single Handle 14S Brushed Nickel
product_description: Maintains a balanced pressure of hot and cold water even when water is turned on or off elsewhere in the home Fits Delta MultiChoice Universal valve rough only Includes Delta 13 Series pressure balance cartridge Must order Delta MultiChoice Universal valve rough R10000 separately to complete the unit Temperature only controlled with handle

reviews.review_body: Went well with our modern faucets, fit our original valve.
This is NOT a DELTA it is a Peerless Deltas lower cost line... looks like it will fit
It fit the valve already installed, the plate was to replace the original plate that was lost prior to completing the install.

I replaced my 2008 Delta shower valve and trim. I switched out the value components and used the old Delta plastic body (Cartridge Assembly)  on the new value Cartridge and just replaced the rubber gaskets with what was in the new kit. Works fine. Looks good.

product_title: Italia Collection LA186100 Stainless Steel Laundry Sink
product_description: Stylish and functional stainless steel laundry sink Fine quality sink bowl formed of 18 gauge Type 304 18 10 nickel bearing stainless steel Sound absorbing pads and special paint applied to the underside of the sink to dampen sound European Made Sinks include all basket strainers mounting hardware and cut out template

reviews.review_body: A beautiful addition to my laundry room rehab.
Really cool sink. Got this to replace my concrete laundry sink. Was a bit disappointed though as the washboard grooves are very, very shallow :(
We are very pleased with the sink, the wash board sets it apart. It looks great and functions well.

product_title: Kingston Brass Gourmetier KDH8815 Kitchen Faucet Sprayer Oil Rubbed Bronze
product_description: Engineering Grade ABS Construction 2 Function Sprayer Head with Stream Flow and Jet Spray Function Check Valve Included for Backflow Prevention Function Easy to Use One Touch Button Operation Fits Standard Female 1 2 IPS Connection Corrosion Resistant Finish

reviews.review_body: Works good
Good style. Easy to install
Horrible. It broke from the faucet the first time I used it. I threw it away and brought a Kohler which I should have done in the first place

the picture is totally different of what you get. DO NOT BUY!!!
what you will get is Designer Trimscape Meridian Stream flow and full spray two functions pull down kitchen faucet sprayer instead

Purchased this to replace 3 year old handle on kitchen faucet.  This one is already failing.  Buttons will not stick when switching between sprays causing an awkward weak flow of water unless you firmly hold down whichever button you want to use.  Exact same thing that happened to first nozzle except this happened in just 6 months.  Looks like I will be purchasing a new faucet altogether and it will NOT be Kingston.

I ordered this item thinking it was a good replacement for my kitchen faucet but when it arrived it was different than the picture. The shape is different and the buttons are not like you see but they are plastic and cheap feeling. The thread length is also shorter so I will have to get more washers and hope it will seal. At this point I am sticking with the old one. First time I have been disappointed with a purchase on Amazon.
I love the sprayer when it's working, but the last three I purchased all lasted only 6 months. Highly recommend buying a different brand.
I THE rubber around the top broke the second day and I had to buy another

I have owned a Kingston kitchen faucet since we moved to Colorado 6 years ago. The design of the whole unit is a very good look for our kitchen. HOWEVER, the business end of the faucet - this sprayer head is crap. I have had to replace the head at least 5 times in those 6 years because the head invariably starts to leak. It might last 2 years or as is the case with the last one only 2 weeks. The leaks are not where the piece screws into the hose, but rather where water comes out in a spray. This has happened over and over. I finally had enough and took a chance on a generic spray head, & unbelievably it was perfect. DO NOT BUY this Kingston brand sprayer, they are terrible.
Replaced a defective head and it works perfectly.
Great replacement for the old one. Works as expected

We didn’t want to spend an arm and a leg for a replacement. So this is the quality I expected. It matches perfectly, but doesn’t fit the best. There is a tiny gap when retracted and it drives me nuts but it could just be our particular faucet. Definitely order to try. We decided to keep it because it’s so much cheaper but has been good quality so far.

I have ordered 2 of these models and each one lasted less than two weeks.  What happens is that the buttons used to change between spray and stream stop working properly and the unit is never able to function in the stream mode properly.  Not only have these two units failed miserably but so did the original head that was also the Kingston Brass brand.  I bought 2 OEM models hoping to have the best fit and function, but will now never buy another Kingston Brass product again.  It can not be simply bad luck to have 3 heads fail within the first few weeks of using each of them.  Of course I waited on filing the return for my first replacement to long accidentally and am unable to return it.

Also a side note, the faucet handle itself gets extremely hot when you are running hot water for dished.  I could understand the head getting hot potentially, but not the handle the controls the water temp and on/off feature of the faucet.  All in all, I don't think the Kingston Brass product line is of good quality.  I doubt I have the entire faucet very long at all.
It was a perfect replacement nozzle for my kitchen fawcett.

I’ve had this for a while now. Off the bat when I first put it on… which was very easy to do… I was disappointed in that the gray plastic part did not go all the way in. So, you can see the plastic. Don’t like that. After using it for a while the black part is rubbing off on the top. And the spray is not as strong as the spray I had before. The only reason why I switched was because the other one was too dirty and I couldn’t seem to get it clean, so it seemed easier to just replace it. But that stream was wider and harder than this one. I may buy a different one in the future but right now this works, so just keeping it.
Works great and reduces water consumption.

product_title: Elkay LK654 Chrome Concealed Deck Metered Lavatory Faucet with Cast Fixed Spout and Push Button Handle
product_description: ADA COMPLIANT Faucet is ADA compliant LEAD FREE COMPLIANT Certified to NSF ANSI 61 and 372 to meet all federal and state regulations for low or no lead products SOLID BRASS CONSTRUCTION Built for long term durability VANDAL RESISTANT AERATOR Includes a special key to remove and change out the aerator ideal for public spaces 1 FAUCET HOLE Faucet designed to be installed using one faucet hole

reviews.review_body: High quality, easy to install, great price

product_title: Elkay ELUH2115PD Lustertone Classic Single Bowl Undermount Stainless Steel Sink with Perfect Drain
product_description: Sink Dimensions 23 1 2 X 18 1 4 X 7 1 2 Min Cabinet Size 27 PERFECT DRAIN Edgeless drain eliminates the gap around the drain for a cleaner more hygienic sink food and gunk go right down the drain REPAIRABLE FINISH Finish is scratch resistant to heavy duty use Deep scratches are repairable Lustrous grain reflects light evenly for high shine UNDERMOUNT INSTALLATION Sink is installed beneath the countertop creating a seamless appearance between the sink and the countertop SINGLE BOWL Bowl gives you uninterrupted space for washing and stacking dishes or other household tasks

reviews.review_body: Very nice product fast shipping . Highly recommend.

product_title: American Standard 221DA004 020 Toilets and Bidets White
product_description: 12 INCH ROUGH IN POWERWASH RIM Scrubs the bowl clean with every flush FINISHING TOUCHES Includes color matched bowl caps and trip lever DURABLE CONSTRUCTION Made from quality vitreous china for strength and reliability

reviews.review_body: Replacing a broken toilet from the menards. Thank god for Amazon shipping. All in all a good improvement on my home.
This  bathroom toilet  saves me  some money ..but  the price is  little too high  for me
Good quality for price nice quick flush efficient
Doesn't have enough to flush much you'll be flushing twice
works well, great price and fast delivery
I can't believe how people can be so ignorant toilets haven't included toilet seats in over 50 years reason is customers want red, yellow white gray etc oh did I forgetplastic or wooden seats !!!
Solid waste won't go down even without toilet paper.  If your a small person maybe ok . BUTT if your a larger person  this toilet is too itty bitty.

I bought this, i was think that was a complete kit that said , but did not bring the toilets cover. they dont said on any place that wasn't included, even the picture show the cover.This is not good is not a wright description of the product.I will buy this a store come complete and cost the same.

IT came very well packed. I must have got lucky compared to some of these other posts. Was easy to install took me about 5 minutes. I'm not a plumber.  I really like it because it uses so little water. My only complaint is I wanted the white, but they charge so much more no idea why.  Works well I but a better shut off valve on it hate those old ones.

This toilet is advertised as having the following dimensions: 25.81 x 19.19 x 29.38 inches

The second two measurements are basically accurate.  However it is not 25.81" long.  IT IS NEARLY 2" LONGER.
The exact measurement of the one received was 27 5/8" (27.625")

At 25.81" It would have worked (and passed code) in my small bathroom.  At 27.625"  it does not.

I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH THE False advertising of the size.

I did not give it 1 start because otherwise it is a decent looking toilet, and appears sound, although I never did use it (for the reason listed above).

The flushing is really fussy with solids, and if it needs to be plunged you need to remember to do an additional flush after the plunging works just to get the pool in the basin refilled.  But it is wonderfully water-frugal, and not flushing 7 gallons of water down after peeing makes up for a host of flaws.

It would work much better retrofitted with a dual-flush arrangement to get more water into the basin after pooping.
Works perfectly
Love it
great
worked out just great !
very nice thanks
Great product
Works likes it suppose to.
Small Toilet!!!!
delivered broken
Perfect product more than expected.
Came in smashed
The product dimensions worked as I wished.
Exactly what I wanted for cheapest price
Came in all broken up. I needed to reorder.

I only received the bottom part without the top tank!
Is that normal?
entire toilet
Have had this installed for about 2 months. Flushes well and looks great
Did not meet my expectations at all. The item delivered was broken. Got a jobnew toilet in Lowe's. Even cheaper.
Would of liked a lid but very good value for good toilet.
you get what you pay for, and since this was less expensive, it works less well (we experience regular minor clogging)
This toilet would not flush properly, too slow. Would not flush bare toilet paper. Had to remove and replace with homedepot brand. Had to take loss, due to return policy expired.
Trying to return this item and the buyer is not corporating I am dicusted with this purchase
Flushes poorly.
Was badly package and tank broke. Poor quality  toilet
I ordered two toilets both came broken one came without the tank . I will never order toilets from online again.
Great price for great toilet.  Came well packaged and installs like every other toilet.
Unfortunately showed up in pieces, and not the fun "some assembly required" kinda pieces.  Working with the company for a replacement.
Love It!!!!
Delivery did not have bowl and no seats. The photo has as complete set. Very deceiving  will retime for refund and order somewhere else

As advertised.
Arrived well packaged and unbroken
Great  little toilet. Easy to install, and functions as advertised.  For the price this bathroom fixture is a gem.
Did not come with lids or a wax seal.
I don't get my toilet seat with my order
This has a weak flush but it works..
Easy to install. Very loud while refilling the tank. Flushing action is peculiar but effective.
Tank arrived broken
This review is for the 1.28 gpf model.  Can't handle much waste, have a plunger handy.
Missing the seat to the toilet. Who sells a toilet with no seat attached when its a combo toilet

It arrived all broken, becuase was of terribly packaging and then not only you wasted your time to have it, and you will get it in pieces, you will be also responsible to pay for return the broken toilet. Please DO NOT BUY IT AND DO YOURSELF A FAVOR...SO SHAMEFUL!!!
It's a working toilet.
Nice to set on
Needs 2-3 flushes sometimes.
works great!! Good water saver.
Perfect ??
Your simple basic functioning toilet
Not impressed  very short  and no toilet seat
I love how fast it came and it’s a good toilet!!
Good value
Excellent, works like a champ. Came fully plumbed and took less than an hour to install. Was delivered in less than 4 days. If you need a good toilet and have limited space this is the rig for you.
I didn’t get to use it because it was destroyed when I received it. I also had a hassle returning it because UPS would not take it back without 2 different return labels.

This product is falsely advertised. The picture of the product shows the hardware that connects the tank to the base, the base to the floor and the actual toilet seat, yet none of these parts were included with the product sent to us. Upon contacting Amazon we were told that those parts are not provided by the manufacturer. So, if you can a toilet you cannot install and one without an actual seat, then this is a great buy!

this toilet does not flush properly you must stand and flush 4 or 5 times for solids or 2 to 3 times for liquid you also must hold handle down during the whole process...ABSOLITE worse toilet I have ever owned...DO NOT BUY
This toilet did not come with a wax ring.
I had know idea the toilet did not come with a seat .
Nice produt , excelente price.
fast deliver great price....  I think I like the oval bowl better than this round one
just as described, a bit taller than the one replaced so I had to buy a longer water connector.
It was reasonably priced and had single flush.

The look is very nice. Very sleek and clean. Installation was a breeze.
Flushing on the other hand. A nightmare. Constant clogging. I am seeking a fix to the overflow pipe. It just isn't long enough. Consequently, not enough water to flush properly. I use more water because I flush before and after use and still clogs happen.
This product performs as it should.  I replaced an old toilet with one and it is more efficient than my old one.  I would recommend this product.
First,the tank showed,no bowl.said all delivered.bowl was on truck next day.think it was there day before.so ask the driver,cause it comes in two separate boxes.
Arrived with a broken handle

Was almost identical to one I replaced.
If mounting hole had lined up would only have needed water closer.

Toilet works great. Delivery was also good. Packaged very well with foam. Toilet fits both 10" and 12" rough in. Came as two separate boxes.

Reason for three stars was it does not come with the toilet seat even though it says everything included and shows it in the picture
I returned this item just because it was not the taller toilet.  Being retired, my husband and myself prefer the higher toilets for ease.  Other than that, was an excellent product.

I love the look of the toilet and the round shape of the bowl.  I purchased them (2) because the height fit under an extension of my vanity counter tops.  It does not flush very well.  I am trying to save water.  It takes two flushes, and sometimes three, to flush waste down.  I am really disappointed since I paid a plumber to install them and I was thinking I would would be conserving water.
This toilet did not come with a lid. I was surprised, I had to go buy one. Other than that, no trouble at all!
Toilet seems to be fine.  It would be good if it had a stronger flush.

The bowl looks great and is as expected.  Unfortunately I was only sent a bowl by Amazon.  I just called American Standard and they will be sending me a tank and wax seal kit.
I am giving a good rating because of American Standard helping.

The toilet is fine but I have two issues. It did not come with the bolt caps that are pictured and the product is not newly manufactured. The plumber said it was manufactured almost a year and half ago. I expect new as in just manufactured not sat on a shelf somewhere. There is evidence of the beginning of dry rot on the flush valve and feel that the seller should send me another one as this one will fail sooner than it should.  Yes, it is technically new and unused but I have no idea how it was stored until now. Also the toilet seat is not included. This picture is not an accurate description of the product.
Broken in box
Good quality for the money and it’s a handsome piece. Looks great.
I REALLY LIKE THIS! WORKS GREAT! VERY QUIET TO USE! AND EASY TO PUT TOGETHER!

The toilet is far superior and more economical that the 1979 vintage 3.5 gallon toilet that it replaced.  At full water level, it uses 1.6 gallons per flush as billed.  However, by the adjusting water level in the tank, it can be made to use less water per flush.  I believe that I have adjusted mine to use around 1.3-1.4 gallons per flush.  At any rate, this toilet provides a quick, powerful and effective flush.  Also, at 16" high, the toilet is 1" higher that the toilet it replaced.  Finally, the toilet arrived very well packed in 2 cardboard boxes that were easy to handle.

I was shocked that the tank bolts and seal weren't included to attach the two American Standard products, tank and matching bowl, together, so lost a star for the trip to the hardware store mid replacement.  After adding the cost of this basic hardware and a toilet seat, the true cost is a bit higher than first appeared vs competition. I already purchased the new wax seal, flange bolts, and water supply line ahead of time, but not including the tank bolts/seal surprised me.

Replaced an old 3.5 fpg with this model, wouldn't flush completely right after it was installed. The tank is huge and the overflow pipe is less than 6" from the bottom; consequently, not enough water to completely flush. When I added two cups of water while flushing, drained perfectly. Called American Standard (expect to be on hold for awhile), she couldn't find the model number listed on Amazon and on the box; did some checks without solving the problem; now you cant' find this model for sale on Amazon. Conclude this toilet was defective in that the overflow pipe was too short (probably all of this model). Used to trust American Standard to do the right thing. Will buy other brands and hope for better results. A very bad Amazon experience.

I can't speak to ease of install as i left that to a plumber.... but plumber recommended i get American Standard fixtures. Imagine my surprise when i realized i could get them on Amazon, they were comparably priced to local big box store AND they wete delivered to my front door! I bought 2, different colors. Both are as expected... i am VERY pleased. Good value, solid fixtures and nice styling.

I needed to replace two toilets, so I decided to try American standard.  I bought two. Great product, great price.
You need to shop around as prices vary. The only surprise I had was that they do not come with seats. So pick those up ahead of time. I highly recommend this product, very happy with my purchase.

product_title: American Standard 1660767 002 Commercial Systems ADA Hand Shower Pause 2 5 GPM Chrome
product_description: 5 Function hand shower Spray pattern adjusts from full spray to full massage combination 1 to pulsating massage to massage mist combination 2 to power mist Includes pressure compensating flow control device Package weight 2 59 pounds

reviews.review_body: Description listed as 5 function including massage, what arrived was 2 function neither one was a massage.  What the shower head does is a spray, mist, and pause. 3 functions.

product_title: Amazon Basics Classic Kitchen Faucet Set with Sprayer Polished Chrome
product_description: Durable brass body and zinc alloy handle construction 1 hole mount or 3 hole mount with deck plate 8 inch center set design Polished chrome finish Classic design with a flow rate of 1 8 gallons per minute Includes kitchen sprayer two 2 23 5 8 inch supply hoses with stainless steel braided exteriors deck plate and detailed installation instructions Assembled dimensions 10 2 x 10 7 x 6 4 inches backed by an Amazon Basics 1 year limited warranty

reviews.review_body:
...breeze! More often than not a task that "should only take a few minutes", ends up taking a few hours due to stuck screws/ frozen fasteners, broken bits or the best, the missing piece! In anticipation I allowed my self two hours to take out the old leaking faucet arrangement and install the Amazon Basics Classic Kitchen Faucet Set with Sprayer. Shockingly the old one, that had been in place for fourteen years, came out relatively easily.  According to Murphy's Law then the installation of the Amazon piece was going to be a royal pain the south end of a north bound pack animal. Nope, glancing at the minimalist instructions and having performed similar tasks before... I was done in just about an hour! Now if I can only get my 36 year old motorcycle to cooperate in a similar fashion...
As it has only been installed for a couple of days and not had a lot of use, at present I can't speak to reliability or other long term functionality. Having said that all the pipes are metal braided, color coded too, and it feels solid enough I suspect it will out last the previous model.
As far as value for money is concerned, I received this as a review/sample product so, heck yeah! But for real people paying real money, I doubt you'll find better at a better price.

Installed this faucet at my in-laws house. Was easy to install. Instructions were clear. I think they will enjoy it at least for a year Or more.. hard to tell, but have had success with similar style faucets.

This Amazon Basic Classic Kitchen Faucet set was easy to install. It fit on my old sink without any problem at all. The spray function works fine.  I was  so happy to receive this! My old faucet was leaking and hard to turn off.  This set has cured that problem.

buying delta since 70's, worst piece of crap i have ever seen, maybe for a travel trailer, plus 109 dollars my first complaint is not listed here

This was a perfect replacement for my faucet and spray that has been broken for the longest time! It was relatively easy to install and it now works great. The water pressure is great, not overwhelmingly prowerful but not too weak either. For me the sprayer is the best part. My last one barely worked and this one is much better. It has a nice clean metallic color

I just finished installing this kit, and first impressions were, "Wow, that was harder to install than I thought." and, " It has some quality construction involved."

But that is a bad start, as the difficulty was mostly removing the old one, while the most difficulty was found installing the sprayer. Behind the sink, there was very little room to get a wrench up there to install the spray diverter.  That took nearly an hour with with tiny rotations to get the top tightened down.

There were some quality issues, mostly in the engineering of this. One, the base plate, which is not needed at all if you only have a single hole sink. It does not seal all the holes that the 3 holes have in a more conventional design. The sealing ring has about 1/8 an inch on either side that is consistent. This means that water that gets to the outer edges can seep under and down below. While the center is pretty well protected, the outer edges are not is what I am trying to say.

When it came to installing the sprayer holster, I put the sealing gasket on top of the sink and placed the holster through it and the sink hole. They recommend it be under the sink with the washer, however, I did not want a collection under the sprayer holster, and chose to do it this way. You will see the black of the o ring, and I may actually switch it later, but I did not see an issue with this.

Outside of installing the main hoses and all the hoses needed for the diverter.  Everything was straight forward and easy. The hoses were long enough for me to install it without any other extensions. This made it really convenient.

I am happy with this, and I hope to see long years with this new faucet. If I do need to get a replacement or I just want an upgrade, replacing this one will be allot easier.

Just as a final note, it does say Amazon Basics on it. But it isn't very conspicuous, being on the back of the handle.

If you are looking for a kitchen faucet and sprayer replacement set, the AmazonBasics Classic set is worth a look.

The polished chrome finish is as expected.  However, the weight of the metal used in the product is less hefty than their bathroom fixtures, which is the reason for the removal of 1 star on this review. It just didn't seem as on par with some of the brand name faucets for kitchens as I've checked out at home improvement stores.

The faucet comes very well packaged with all the parts and info a DIYer needs to install both the faucet and sprayer.  The simplicity of the design and the directions are a definite plus!

This set is priced right and above average in terms of build quality and finish.  It is a little bit lighter weight as compared to AmazonBasics bathroom faucet fixtures (I have two of those), but it does feel like it will be durable despite this.  The action is smooth and installation easy with the included directions.

I'd recommend it to anyone who is looking for an easy replacement at the right price.

When I bought my house a few months ago it wasn’t that old but not new either.  Most of it was in great shape but some things were either worn, dated or something I wanted to replace for whatever reason.  One thing I generally want to customize when I buy a new house is the sink faucet and this place was no exception. The kitchen sink faucet was a high quality brand and looked okay but the swivel action was tight because of corrosion and the single lever handle was very difficult to adjust.  And worst of all for me was that it did not have a side sprayer, which is high on my list of important things to have.

FINDING THE RIGHT ONE

I shopped for months to find a faucet I liked and that’s not as easy as you think.  The only ones they are displaying these days are the huge high arc restaurant type faucets with pull down sprayers.  I had one of those in my old house and it didn’t suit my lifestyle.  I wanted a more traditional single lever faucet, but the few I could find were mostly chrome plated plastic and very few of them included a side sprayer.  Even the premium famous name brand faucets had at least some of the exposed components made from plastic and also some of the internal parts as well.

IS IT ALL PLASTIC

When I saw this one from Amazon Basics I hesitated because my first thought was that it must be 100% plastic for the price. When I saw it firsthand I could not believe it, the entire thing is almost all made entirely of brass and chrome plated metal, even the internal parts that you don’t see.  The only non-metal parts are the rubber washers and a few small minor trim parts.  Even the base plate that covers the unused holes in a 3 or 4 hole sink – note that this is a single hole faucet – is chrome plated metal, this is a part that is almost always plastic these days.  The sprayer, however, is chrome plated plastic.  I can live with that because it doesn’t get anywhere near the wear and tear and it is easily replaceable, and the plastic does help keep it from getting too warm like some of the metal ones.

INSTALLATION

After removing the old corroded unit, which took most of the installation time, installing the new one was simple. No surprises, no unplanned trips to the parts store, everything fit as expected with one glaring exception, but it’s an important one and this is something you should pay close attention to.  My steel sink has four standard sized holes, three for the faucet and one for the sprayer.  As mentioned this faucet is designed for mounting in a single hole sink but comes with a trim plate to cover the hot and cold water holes on a three hole sink.  Except it doesn’t.  The trim plate is about a half inch too short to completely cover what would be the hot water hole and there is no amount of adjusting that can make it fit.  That would be unacceptable and I would not have continued with the installation but I came up with an idea – I shifted the entire assembly over to the left so the feed lines are now routed through the hot water hole and I am using the cold water hole for the side sprayer, which left me with an unused hole that I used to add an under-sink soap dispenser pump.

SOLUTION

What that does is to move the water flow directly over my garbage disposal, which worked out to be a big positive, and to let the water spout have full range of motion over the left sink basin but still be able to swing enough over the right basin to use it on that side as well.  It sounds strange but it looks good and works well and let me add a built-in soap dispenser using the fourth hole.  I’m telling you all of the positives because I had to adapt to a negative situation caused by a bad product design but I should make it clear that I deducted a point for that, not everyone might have the same flexibility as me to settle for an off-center faucet.  I suggest the designers go back to the drawing board and come up with a better design for the trim plate.

YEA OR NAY

In use I am satisfied with the look, feel, water pressure, smoothness of operation, ease of installation and high quality of materials.  At an even hundred bucks at the time I got it I think it is a worthwhile contender compared to the major brand names and is far superior to most of the no-name brands I looked at.

This is the polished chrome faucet with sprayer. Initial impressions were that it's a lot nicer quality than I was expecting and significantly nicer than the 60 dollar sink option at the local hardware store, where that's the least expensive option and it gets more expensive from there. The quality of those faucets is really poor and they wear out quickly. This faucet is a lot nicer, and you can feel it as soon as you grab the faucet handle to turn it on. It feels heavy and it's easy to control flow and temperature with one hand. The faucet neck is a classic lower profile design which helps to keep water from spraying everywhere if you don't have a deep sink. The braided lines for hot and cold water are color coded, making installation easy. A lot of faucets do not do this so it was a nice detail to see. This faucet set comes with the escutcheon plate but it can be installed with or without it. I have an older sink with several holes so I used the plate and it looks nice. The chrome seems to be fairly high quality and hasn't scratched at all during the install or after cleaning it a few times.

I've installed a decent amount of kitchen faucets over the years, not professionally but in different homes I've lived in. It's not difficult but the older your old faucet is, the more trouble you are likely to have. It helps to have plenty of lighting under the sink and the right tools, although you can install this faucet with pretty much just a crescent wrench and Phillips screwdriver for the spray nozzle. A hex wrench is included. The instructions call for using a bit of teflon tape but I didn't use any and there are no leaks so that may be something you'll need and it's not included in the set.

Some people don't like or want to have a sprayer in their sink, but instead of not using it, I'd recommend installing it under the sink and making a little hook for it because it's good to have sometimes. It doesn't leak and if you never use it, it won't hurt anything. This is what I did since I put a soap dispenser in the hole where the sprayer is supposed to go and I didn't want to cut another hole in the top of my sink basin.

Overall, I am impressed with the quality of this faucet and how it works. I do have one complaint and it's the same for all AmazonBasics products. They insist on laser engraving the unattractive AmazonBasics logo on the top of the faucet handle (visible in the second stock photo). Fortunately, it's not super noticeable in person unless you are right on top of it but it's kind of annoying. I wish Amazon would come up with a cool stylized and subtle mark for their products. There's no way to rub it off, it's etched into the metal. Might be a deal breaker for some so I thought I'd mention it. Overall, a nice faucet for the price. It's very similar to more expensive models I've seen from Delta and Moen and it's likely made by a well known faucet manufacturer, but I'm not sure who it is since there are no obvious markings on the facuet anywhere.

product_description: Dedicated filtered water faucet Brushed nickel faucet keeps filtered water separate from tap water having consistent access to filtered water may reduce reliance on single use plastics modern design looks great on any countertop NSF ANSI certified filter 2 stage system includes a premium coconut carbon block filter with 0 5 micron rating fully tested and certified against NSF 42 53 and 372 standards effectively reduces chlorine taste and odor and heavy metals delivering reliably purified water straight to your glass Easy installation System connects to a cold water line and dedicated faucet using simple push connectors installation kit includes tubing tube cutter feedwater adapter locking clips washers and locking nuts elbow connectors and seal tape Powerful compact system Convenient compact design has minimal impact on undercounter space making it an excellent choice for smaller households offices and apartments as well as for RVs and campers INCLUDED COMPONENTS 2 Stage Filtration System 2 Filters Filter Housing PE Pipes and Faucet REPLACEMENT FILTERS For replacement filters search for Brio RPFUSPP5M Sediment Filter Brio RPFUSCTO5MS2 Carbon Block Filter

reviews.review_body: The whole water purifier is smaller than my original one. It can be installed successfully according to the instructions. All the pipe joints are quick joints, which are easy to install and do not leak. The water purification effect will be verified later.

The Brio 2-Stage Under-sink Filtration System, Brushed Nickel Faucet, 950-Gallon Capacity Sediment produces clear, crisp tasting water, genuinely filtered with this great system. Easy to install with instant results.

I ordered this under-sink filtration system in size 3 and it came in a really good packaging without any damages. There is an instruction on how to install the whole system but it’s super easy and as a person who has never done or installed this system before, it took me about an hour to install and set up everything. It works great and I’m really happy with the quality.
Brio makes good water related products. I installed this unit for my daughter - it was a replacement for another unit and this made installation quite easy - no problems.

I would give this a 5 star because it works great for our purpose.  We replaced an older system that we could no longer get filters for, so installation was easier than if you are installing for the first time. The only reason I dropped it a star is because they have the filters listed here, but it was a chore to find them.  Further, they are almost the price of the contraption itself.  Hoping for a non OEM part here.

This review was for Brio 2-Stage Undersink Filtration System, Brushed Nickel Faucet, 950-Gallon Capacity Sediment, Carbon Block & GAC Filters, Chlorine & Heavy Metal Reduction, 0.5 GPM

It was challenging to put a hole in the granite. After putting the hole, it took about half an hour to put it under the cabinet. The water tastes much better than before. The replacement filters are ridiculously expensive. It is almost the same price as the whole set.

My initial review was a bit irate over a part not being included. It has been an absolute train-wreck at home. without having a water filter setup. However, while cleaning up today my son found a small package that had somehow gotten under the sofa. He was the one who initially unpacked the unit for me and assisted and he swore up and down he unpacked everything properly. I will point out that the list of included pieces does not mention the vital connector piece so it was easier to possibly overlook it falling out the box.  The ordeal being done and the system installed, I can say its performance is alright.

The handle is a bit stiff to turn and to me it doesn't have quite the crispness that my old filter seemed to have, but the major issue of the chlorine is resolved. It also was a little awkward to hang under the cabinet and I have to modify the space a bit to get it work. I settled on four star because the instructions and parts list were still not up to par. In terms of value for price, we will see how well it performs over time and I will update in the future with pictures and any developments.
Definitely worth the purchase

This filtration system took longer to install that I thought but that was largely from having to remove the previous sprayer attachment for the faucet. I have zero experience plumbing and was able ti get this installed with relative ease once the previous faucet was out.

The water is clear and tastes good once you run the water to purge the filters. The faucet handle turns smoothly.

I did have some minor issues with the installation however.

The biggest problem I ran into was that the hole in my counter was too large. We were able to improvise with a large shiny washer so it looks like it belongs but this is the kind of thing that should be included with the kit. (Or the bottom of the faucet should just be made larger).

A minor issue was that the pieces included were odd quantities. It included 5 screws (one of which looked different from the others) but only called for 2. It also called for at least three of the blue plastic locking pieces, and really could have used more, but only included 2.

The instructions also don't specify that you should use the plumber's tape (the white tape included).

Overall, it's a decent unit but plan on getting a large washer and a thin rubber one to put under it.

This water filter was super simple to install.  I did have the issue that the hole in my counter was 1.5 inches in diameter… I purchased a separate part, the OFFO brand flange, ASIN B099WNBJM5.  You can see it in the second pic.  It was $6 and worked well enough.

Installation was super easy.  Took maybe 15 minutes.  They included Teflon tape, which I didn’t need, and a hose cutter which I did use.

The resulting water is free of chlorine and other nasties.  Which was my goal.

Would definitely recommend this filter.

This is one of the most compact designs that I have ever seen for water filtration systems, especially this extra effective three-barrel version. Normally, these are very bulky and it requires quite a bit of rearranging under the sink to fit them as well as reconfiguration of the piping, but this water filter is both small and easy to install. It is about the size of three standard water bottles if that gives you perspective! The directions are super easy to follow and help you install this all on your own, no plumber is needed which saves a ton of money and time! It starts working right away and there is a noticeable difference in water quality. Personally, I can tell that there is much less alkaline taste (I live in LA where the water is notoriously bad) so this has been a lifesaver.

Additionally, the rust-resistant lining and filtration system make this perfect for older homes or apartments. I live in an older apartment where the pipes are prone to rusting and infecting the water. With little kids often in my apartment, I want to make sure I am giving them the purest water possible. This creates so much peace of mind for me and my family and it would for anyone living in an area with unsustainable tap water. This is also a much more cost-efficient option for homeowners than replacing pipes and it helps relieve space by not making you get a Brita filter for the fridge.

Overall, this is a great option for older homes and for people trying to save space. I highly recommend it!

We had a perfectly working brita under the sink 3 stage filter that became obsolete. The filters we no longer possible to find anywhere. Since the install was already done, I was hoping to keep most of it in place and just swap out the filter system. Unfortunately, the water tubes on this system is a smaller diameter.

Working under the sink is always a chore. One thing that made this install a little easier, is that installing the faucet is toolless thanks to the large thumb disc nut. Unfortunately, the basin knockout is barely larger than the diameter of the faucet base and I had to improvise a spacer.

The valve inlet will fit on a larger or smaller fitting by way of an adapeter. The outlet on the other hand may or may nor require an adapter depending on the diameter of your waterline. I was able to reuse the adapter that I had installed for the previous water filter system. Otherwise, it would have had to been a trip to the local hardware store.

The rest of the install was super easy.  The flush process is basically the same as other filter systems. The faucet had decent water flow.

Overall, simple to install and works as expected.
 Hopefully, the filters will be available when the time comes.

Update: well, it is not as bad as the brita complete lack of replacement filters, but the brio 3 stage filter kit sold on amazon is not the correct replacement for this model. In fact, if you go to the brio page, they list the three replacement filters seperately. And they do not sell those as a kit. In total, the filters are just about as expensive as a whole new setup.

And I did not originally note this, like the other reviews, I too had to improvise a washer for the too small in diameter faucet base.

reviews.review_body: This seat is a sturdy high quality safety bar. Much better than the popular ones that attach to the back of any toilet seat.

I can't believe it took us this long to find the perfect toilet seat with handles that are sturdy and stay in place!!  I wish we would have found this a year ago, vs. using the bedside commode stand over the toilet seat.  You have alot of room in front for the person to clean themselves.  The handles stay put and do not move so there is an extra feeling of safety and security for the disabled using it.  Thank you!!

The widely-spaced handles are so convenient for my Mom, who is recovering from a stroke and needs the extra space to clean herself properly. Even as wide as they are, the arrangement of the handles attached to the seat allows for easy access to the areas around the toilet for cleaning and convenience.  This product is so much nicer and well-crafted than any of the other toilet seat handles I found online or in my local medical supply stores.

If you're looking for a toilet seat with arms this is by far the best one on the market. We like it so much we have 2 in our house. Be sure to measure the distance from the arms to the wall. We had to remove the toilet paper holder so we could lift the seat to clean. I purchased a seat with arms and it had a bar running underneath the seat. You don't want to buy a model with a bar running under the seat, it gets dirty, rusty, and unsightly, if you know what I mean. You will not have that problem with this seat. Easy to install and well made. You will not be disappointed.
Attachment design is very simple and solid. No concerns with my 84yo father using this safely.

Bought the Delta tub drain assembly used.  Got it in and first thing I notice is silicone everywhere.  What a mess.  After cleaning up a bit I realized some parts were missing.  Drain plug missing, upper collar missing, lower gasket missing.  Someone clearly bought the kit and used what they needed and returned it.  Someone needs to check before authorizing a refund.

Not only did you charge my credit card immediately, but Showerdirect put in for a "placeholder" FEDX number that was not registered (ie not traceable) such that it looked like I was trulygoing to get this order SOMETIME! I ordered it in March and delivery date is still pending and last told AUGUST. How ridiculous is that? It would not have been such an overwhelming issue if I had been told up front this was the case but I am renovating a house and the tub install is awaiting this critical piece - THAT and they CHARGED my credit card.

Buyer beware of anything not directly coming from Amazon. Why Amazon allowed them to charge me I have no idea. In fact, AMAZON does not charge until shipped. Things are slacking....perhaps Amazon is taking on too much.

I bought this to match my other venetian bronze delta fixtures. Matches as expected. The drain leaks a little at low tub volumes but seems to seal under more pressure. I love the push to open and close feature.
this is attractive for a standard tub shower but I was only able to use the trims as the unit did not fit my center drain cast iron tub

It worked, but for the price, I am truly disappointed in the quality of Delta products. The retaining clip that is supposed to hold the overflow plate tight to the tub wound up just damaging the tub, as it did not use an actual two piece plate design. Instead they cheaped out for some weird half moon paper clip looking device that wound up just bending and scratching the tub. The machine work inside the actual brass T was terrible, and could easily catch hair and other debris and lead to an easily clogged drain. Wound up having to port the inside of the T to give it smooth transitions so that water would flow more easily. The nut for the bottom extension into the trap is not included at all, which means you are taking a trip to the local hardware store even AFTER buying this kit.

For the most part the install was easy but there was a small leak that took quite a bit of patience to fix.  Definitely requires a drain wrench to do the install.  Quality was good and all parts were in the box.

To avoid breaking 90 degree bend restrictions he used this to lean on and lift his leg to the back, bending his knee to get in. Worked great, and double bonus was he was able to use it to lower onto the raised toilet seat as well, as the tub is next to the toilet. Plus it was easy for me to "install" and remove when no longer needed.

When I opened the box, I was almost knocked over by the odor. I was afraid I'd have to send it back. Fortunately, the smell was completely gone the next day. I easily attached it to my tub. I wanted something tall, to make up for the shortness of my tub. This is great. I really like being able to turn it perpendicular to the tub. It feels more natural than other rails. I've been leaning on it heavily, and it hasn't budged. I'm very pleased!

I bought this for my 90 yr old mother in law for when she gets in and out of the shower. It gives her the support she needs. We have the standard tub and no shower doors, just curtains. It's not easy for her to just step in the tub/shower like we young 50 yr old folks can. We decided to have her move in with us instead of her living alone. With het age, we had to consider proofing the house especially the bathroom so that she is comfortable, safe,  and not having to remodel the bathroom, which is not in our budget at the moment. This item can be installed and removed easily. The handle can be turned  a couple of ways. It is not bulky and does not take up too much space on the tub. I believe it's a very useful tool at any age.

I bought this for my mom and she loves it. We both feel better know that she has extra safety. I asked her was the handle slippery at all when she got out of the shower and she said not at all. That was a concern of mine bc it’s not covered with any rubber or traction on the handle. Also, we have it on a fiberglass tub. I know it says it not used for that type but when you put it on, you can still tighten it well without damaging the tub. I checked it myself to see how secure it was. I wouldn’t have left it on if I didn’t think it would be secure. Very happy with the purchase. She’s had it about a month so far.

This is a very sturdy devise for the tub.  I had a difficult fit. My sunken jetted whirlpool tub in my tile bathroom was installed in our Florida home 15 years ago. We had no handles installed at that time.  Now that the therapeutic need to  use the tub more often has made it necessary to install something sturdy for balance control on entering and leaving a "sunken" tub.

This works!  Be sure you measure width closely.  This was much more satisfying than the suction cup devises.

I would recommend.  I am 68 yr. old female.
I bought this for my 97 year old mother to use getting in and out of the bath tube and it really helped you maintain her balance.

I purchased this for my dad to use when he comes to visit at our house. He has MS and limited mobility of the legs. Unfortunately he's not able to lift one if his legs over the tub wall so we had to return this product. However I did open it and install it (that's how we learned he couldn't use it after all) and it's a very solid and heave weight product. It stuck to the tub wall firmly after properly and tightly installed. Padding prevents tub damage. Would buy this again if I ever have need.

We've had this for a few months now and it's great.  I needed one that was height adjustable to make sure it was high enough for my 6' 4" husband, but it turns out the lower side of the loop is perfect for me (5' 4").  It's easy to put in place and adjustable there, too, so we could try it at either end of our contoured jacuzzi tub and we could remove it to take with us on vacation.  We could also decide if we wanted the loop parallet to the tub side or cross-ways to it so it takes up even less space for those using the tub who don't need a safety rail.  I also like the clean lines and white/blue colors.  Very happy with the purchase!

This is very sturdy and was easy to put on the tub, but I believe it would be best on a tub that has completely straight or flat sides. My tub has some unevenness on the outside so placement is a little trickier and where the appliance can be placed is limited.

First day of use but just practicing getting into and out of the tub was easier and safer.  Handle can change quickly from parallel to perpendicular to get the best grip. Clamp is sturdy and easy to fasten (except for a broken fingernail so keep fingertips tucked as you turn.)  Our older tub has narrow sides and the clamp still holds tightly to it.  I'll test it on our new wider-sided tub in a few weeks and report again.
This is quality product at a reasonable price. It is easy to install. It makes it much easier to get in and out of the bathtub.

I just moved to an apartment. The bath tub is very deep. I live alone and am afraid I will try to get out of the tub and fall. The item was received in the amount of time I was expecting. It was very easy to put together. Just a few parts need to be inserted. I was impressed with the different heights the handle was able to be raised. I had look on Amazon to find a rail of this nature. I choose this railing based on the great reviews. Also the price was right. I had seen other railings that were too expensive for my budget. The didn't have the ability to be raised or lowered to fit your height. The Bathtup safety rail is very sturdy. I like that it fits tight against my bathtub. With the ability to adjust it on my bath tub gave me the ability to place it close to the commode making it dual purpose for me. I no longer have the fear that my foot will not be raised high enough to exit the tub. I would purchase this rail again and recommend it too others who have a deep tub. It is also very sturdy and should hold any weight.

La versión anterior era más fácil de instalar. Las conecciones de mangueras deben mirar hacia atrás y no hacia el lado.
Good price.  Good Transaction!

I knew how cheap these are there would be difficulties in the install.
The first problem is that it is very unlikely that the 3/8" ports are in alignment once you get the handles and diverter installed NO MATTER HOW you twist and turn and set the valves.  The included two short copper pipes will not be of much use.

The second problem is that the H/C valves have a right angle on the 3/8" ports which makes it hard/impossible to squeeze in a  stainless 3/8" flex hose to connect to the diverter.  Essentially the ports are out of alignment to directly use the provided copper pipes but too close together to finagle in the hoses because the coupling ends conflict with each other.

In the end I had to use two right angle 3/8" compression elbows on the diverter and two 3/8"-to3/8" compression hoses to get it hooked up.  Also I replaced the el-cheapo nylon 20" 3/8" compression hose to sprayer with a stainless hose.

Thus I spent an extra $25 in stainless hoses and $15 in compression elbows to hook this up  (plus of coarse two stainless hoses to get to wall H/C).  So in the end the extra $40  still makes it a lot  cheaper than the name brand units.  If you're an advanced DIY'r  you can do the above.  If not you probably want to just suck it up and buy the expensive units.
Good
I was very pleased with my purchase. The tie is of good quality and has been delivered on time.
Cheap crap

After almost not buying due to several negative reviews, I felt I should share my positive experience with a kit I purchased in September of 2016.

I purchased this kit along with a Toto Piedmont bidet – the cheapest way I could get a new bidet in the states (I needed to replace a non-functional bidet prior to selling a house).

While I am intermediate to advanced in most aspects of handymanry, I am not very good with plumbing, but I was still able to install the new bidet with this faucet in less than two hours. The installation wasn't "easy," but I don't see how it could be made much better for any four-hole bidet faucet installation.

The tube that came with my kit to deliver water from the diverter to the aerator was already nylon. If this had been copper, as I think was the case in earlier models, it would have been a little more frustrating. I also replaced the copper tubes from the supply (hot/cold) valves to the diverter valve with polystyrene because the holes in the bidet weren't in alignment and I didn't trust myself to make an accurate bend in such a short piece of copper. 1' of tubing and 4 brass inserts cost less than $3; I reused the ferrules and nuts from this kit. Nylon and polystyrene are easier to install than copper, but give the manufacturer some credit: copper is superior over time.

And as for the reports of a weak jet, the spray reaches about 18" when both hot and cold supplies are 100% and the diverter is 100% open to the aerator, but the jet stays low until at about 80% of total volume.

Overall, the installation experience was no more frustrating than any other plumbing job of similar magnitude, and the faucet works well.
Fast delivery great product

reviews.review_body: Great American made faucet. I’ve bought these before and they’re so well made and very reliable. These are commercial grade, a big step up from normal home grade faucets

We travel approximately 6 -8 weeks per year in our RV.  As our Winnebago Micro Mini has gone through its paces, we have identified some "improvements" that were needed, one of which was the two handle H/C bathroom sink faucet.  The cheap plastic squeaked and was difficult to adjust.

The faucet placement in my RV is a 4" spaced two hole - not three as most bath faucets.  The Chicago faucet mounts on two holes at 4", and is a very heavy duty metal unit and was a direct fit replacement for the Winnie faucet.  No tools required to replace it, I simply unscrewed the old one and installed the new one.  This one protrudes into the sink basin about 3/4" more than the original, but it is not an issue.

Overall very happy with this upgrade.

Great sink! I switched between 4 different sinks in my cart for over 2 months before I finally pulled the trigger on this purchase. The size is what ultimately sold me. It was incredibly well packaged and arrived in perfect condition.

reviews.review_body: Solid faucet that looks good and was easy to install. The side sprayer is made of plastic, which is disappointing. It looks and feels cheap. I should have read all of the reviews edited purchasing, I hope that this faucet will not leak, as many others have had that issue. For now, I am very satisfied with the actual faucet, although not the sprayer. As far as the seller, shipping was faster than expected.
Beautiful. Solid faucet. Not installed yet but ready to go - all part there and ready for installation.
Well, someone took parts from the faucet we received and then packaged it back up. Maybe this item should not be sold as new if it is not.
this was delivered on time it is beautiful it will go well with the new kitchen.
Great Product!!! Same as promise in the definition

The low water volume compared to our previous faucet is disappointing but that unfortunately is explained by the meddling of the California government.  The real disappointment is the flimsy plastic side sprayer.  It is too light and the matching cradle/stand is not designed to hold it firmly and vertically in place.  It tips/leans over with the slightest contact and often needs to be straightened.  Our old faucet's solid metal side sprayer could be placed down and it would fall into place and stay there.

Beautiful looking faucet but started to leak shortly after it was installed. Plumber believes it is a factory defect. Seller was extremely courteous and helpful and I will be returning this faucet for a new one and am hoping there are no further problems as this faucet is so nice looking.

After less than two months since installation, one of the lines to the diverter cracked, soaking the sink cabinet. I have no idea how it happened. There’s plenty of slack in the lines and there aren’t any items under the sink that can get snagged. Since this is part of the main faucet assembly, the whole faucet needs to be replaced. This of course means the sink is out of commission until a replacement arrives. I expect more durable fittings from a $400+ faucet!
3rd faucet in a month.  Still not 100% satisfied - I see it as a manufacturing issue but seller has been very good about it.

This is really attractive looking and for that I'm happy.  But I find it somewhat challenging to govern a low flow from the faucet.  And the sprayer comes out as a straight line and too little or too much - it's very challenging to guide the stuff in the sink to the drain with this sprayer.  Overall - I personally think the cost is way too high for the actual functionability of the thing.
Valve leaked immediately after installation.  Koehler customer service was responsive and sent a replacement valve quickly.

just had a new KOHLER K-99262-CP installed. It is leaking under the handle/controller. It is not obvious how to get to the valve to tighten it and it is IMPOSSIBLE to find any useful information (like for example a diagram or owners manual) at the Kohler website. Which is infuriating...

This is a very high quality faucet.  We installed this one in our laundry room in a deep bowl Kohler cast iron sink.  The installation was simple and quick and it really looks nice with our quartz countertop.  Also, my wife really likes the "whisk broom" like spray feature.

When we had this faucet installed we noticed the decreased flow but we got used to it, put it down to "saving water" BUT when the sprayer stuck we were disappointed.  The stainless steel  finish was very compatible with our brushed nickel of our other items in the kitchen so I gave it 3 stars.
More superlatives for Kohler.  Exceptional quality, thoughtful design, perfect instructions.  Would never buy any other brand.
Kohler manufacturers good quality plumbing fixtures.  This is good but it does not feel as sturdy as I think other Kohler products seem to be.  I give it an A Minus.
Beautiful looking faucet; but it is leaking after 5 months...  Need to pay a plumber to rebuild it...  We expected a better value for a product we payed so much for!

This was purchased as part of our kitchen remodel. Our kitchen designer suggested the vibrant brushed stainless steel to go better with our new dark stained cabinets and stainless steel appliances. I already owned this faucet in polished chrome and thought I'd just use that. His suggestion was that the polished chrome has a more blue tone to the finish where the brushed stainless steel has a warmer tone and would look better with the wood cabinets. I usually like the polished chrome, easily wiped down, sparkling mirror finish...he had me thinking and I decide to try the brushed stainless. I am glad I did, it does look much better with the espresso stain color of my cabinets. The brushed finish does not show water spots and is easy to wipe down and always looks nice and clean.  The faucet design is nice and has a traditional look. I love the water handle especially when your hands are dirty you can use the back of your hand to simply push the handle to turn on the water. I also like the sprayer it has two "shower" patterns one is a cone shaped water spray, the other is more straight line spray with a harder spray which is useful when rinsing down the sides of the sink.  I purchased separately a Kohler soap dispenser that mounts in the countertop in the same finish (shown in photo doesn't come with faucet). I also purchased the sink drain and strainer separately with the same finish for a complete coordinated look. Finishes have all held up perfectly and still look like new.

Replaced my kitchen faucet with this Kohler faucet and it has worked great. It's short enough not to block my window and swivels freely. The handle is responsive and easily operated without gripping the handle. The installation was far simpler than I expected and its been working great.

I recommend purchasing a Kohler faucet which is the best .  No faucet is worst than American Standard.
